Paper and Books

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

T

Wiki Home

Item Creation Process: Crafting · Design · Fabrication · Materials · Production
Design Types: Tools · Clothing and Jewelery · Containers


Both loose paper and the books into which it is bound can be filled with information by a Sage using the rules for Books.

Paper

A solid material can be converted to "paper" with a Sapience * Sage check. An inventory slot worth of material is can be converted to a number of sheets worth of paper equal to ({101-Fragility}+Malleability)/2. The weight of the pack of paper is unchanged, though dividing up the sheets seperates the weight into proportional sections.

All other statistics of the material remain unchanged.

Paper recieves a Durability rating equal to the {lower (101- Malleability) or Fragility)* 100. Paper looses a point of Durability when studied (for manuals) or examined (text window opened). It also looses a point every (100-Malleability) game days. Many common types of paper take additional damage due to inappropriate conditions such as rain.

Books

Binding a set of paper into a book requires a group of pages and generally some other material. The durability of the pages is averaged, then the other components add the greater of ({101- average Malleability}* 10) or (sum of the lower of each component's {Malleability or 201-Viscosity}) to the book's Durability.

Ink
